name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens within the system said that they have received a notice that "the central leadership has instructed us to be vigilant against the alienation and deviation of throwing eggs."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After we have seen various real-name reports against the public security, procuratorial, judicial, military and police in recent days.
On August 7, a man in Xianyang, Shaanxi reported himself by real name.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of August 9, Xinyue Road, Zhuhai City, Guangdong Province. A man held a woman hostage with a knife by the bridge. During the time, the man kept saying "Quickly take a picture for me"
The person who filmed the video said "I heard that I was cheated of 400,000 yuan, and the special police brothers came in cars one by one"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens provided more of Jiang Jie’s Moments. The latest one on August 9 was posted at Jinan International Airport, in which he said he would never return to China in his lifetime, and he was suspected of running away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Screenshot of Linyi Jiang Gongzi's Moments was blocked on Weibo

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Ice cream and popsicles sampling report: Half of the E. coli exceeded the standard, which may be related to "feces" pollution.
Recently, the State Administration for Market Regulation and other departments announced the quality sampling results of frozen drinks such as ice cream and popsicles. A total of 11 batches of ice cream failed the sampling, of which more than 70% failed the microbial indicators (E. coli, total colony count). The bacteria come directly or indirectly from the feces of humans and warm-blooded animals.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 9 (Release) Baishan City, Jilin Province. Chen Dalong, deputy director of the Baishan Intermediate People's Court, reported in his real name that Liu Mingli and others from the Baishan Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection acted as thugs for illegal businessmen and retaliated against judges who performed their duties normally. Chen Dalong said that he was retaliated against by Liu Mingli from the Baishan Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection because he offended illegal businessmen at work.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 9, "The Forefront of Cases" revealed that a Canadian citizen named Chen Lin was passively involved in a political struggle among leading cadres because his company established many years ago cooperated with a Chinese state-owned enterprise. On November 19, 2021, Chen Lin was designated for residential surveillance under the arrangement of the Sichuan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection and was detained in an abandoned interrogation room in the basement of the procuratorate on the grounds of non-existent embezzlement of office.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 10, the Lixia District Public Security Bureau announced that Jiang had continued to fabricate false information and posted it online in the name of "President of Thousand Characters Group". The public security organ imposed an administrative detention of 15 days on Jiang.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 10, Xinyang, Henan. According to a person in the legal field, the father of Shi Huajun, a judge at the Xinyang Intermediate People's Court, opened a law firm in the same district where his son worked. He ignored the rules on judges' recusation, which clearly state that the judge's spouse, children, and parents should all be the objects of the judge's recusation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A telephone notification was circulated online regarding the implementation of General Secretary Xi Jinping's general instructions and the crackdown on the unhealthy trend of "throwing eggs" in the field of state-owned central enterprises.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 10th is Chinese Valentine's Day, and the topic #Chinese Valentine's Day consumption plummets, young people don't pay love tax# has become a hot search. According to reports, the import value of diamonds fell by 29.55% year-on-year, and fell by 39.6% compared with 2021, which is almost the same as 2017. Some netizens also said that they have no money at all, which is the result of consumption downgrade.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 6, Tesla Model Y was included in the Fujian Provincial Government Procurement List. As of the time of writing, the relevant information has been deleted from the website.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 9, Liaocheng, Shandong. A woman reported in her real name: Wang Xinsheng, a cadre of the Liaocheng Dongchangfu District Taxation Bureau, and his family of three received 40 million yuan from unknown sources.
The local taxation department responded: He is a retired cadre and the report has been received.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 9, Zhengzhou, Henan. It was reported online that a veteran died while receiving treatment at the First Affiliated Hospital of Zhengzhou University. His wife held her husband's portrait and brought her children to the hospital to defend her rights.
According to his wife, her husband was hospitalized on August 2. The hospital only performed four tests, including temperature, blood pressure, blood tests, and electrocardiogram, before administering drug injections.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 9 (Released) Lawyer Zhang Jinhui released a video to explain why it is difficult to overturn unjust cases: for example, you are colleagues, and you appeal to other colleagues because of a wrong judgment. If the verdict is overturned, it proves that your professional ability is poor; at the same time, there is a reversal rate within the court. "For example, if there are problems in 20 out of 100 cases, I think it is not possible to overturn the verdict, because this court stipulates that the reversal rate of the second instance cannot be higher than 5%." The lawyer called for the disclosure of these systems and for the supervision of the people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 9, a netizen named "Yuan Fang" posted a post saying that in February 2020, he posted several Weibo posts criticizing Huawei, one of which added the hashtag #howlowhowto. Eight months later, Huawei reported the case and he was arrested and detained in Dongguan for nine months. He said that he and his lawyer have formally submitted an appeal, "This time I just want to publicly ask for fairness."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A lawyer in Shenzhen was banned from speaking for spreading the rumor that "Zhao Lijian's wife's cancer treatment cost less than 300 yuan." At the same time, the Shenzhen Lawyers Association stated that the incident was under investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 9, the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs released a report titled "The National Endowment for Democracy's Behavior and True Face". The report pointed out that the foundation is a white glove of the U.S. government and has long been subverting other countries' regimes, interfering in other countries' internal affairs, inciting division and confrontation, misleading and interfering with public opinion, and carrying out ideological infiltration under the guise of promoting democracy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, netizens in Xi County, Henan Province, posted a video complaining that it was too difficult to apply for a passport. The picture showed that local people needed to provide a bank credit report, fixed income flow, social security payment status, work unit certificate, and marital status materials to apply for a passport.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 8, CCTV reported that "Russia's Ministry of Foreign Affairs strongly condemned the Ukrainian army's attack on Kursk Oblast, and the tension between Russia and Ukraine has intensified", which was ridiculed by netizens. Netizens replied, "I think Russia should bear at least half of the salary of CCTV staff."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 9 (Release) After the China Children and Teenagers' Fund was exposed for requiring the mother of the child to sleep with her before giving donations, a victim woman posted a video saying that she had reported the case before, but the police refused to file a case on the grounds of voluntary participation. "I just wanted to save the child. As a single mother at that time, I had no choice." The woman thanked everyone who helped her and also hoped to be treated fairly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/Sr0wkUymm5

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to reports, the US government has included five Chinese companies on the Entity List of the Uyghur Forced Labor Prevention Act on the grounds of forced labor, prohibiting the import of goods from these companies. In response to this, netizens replied, "It turns out that the people who care about me are on the other side of the strait. There is still justice in the world. Thank you, America, for paying attention to our working hours."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 9, the man posted a video saying that he was trapped at the Malaysian airport and unable to return home because he lost his passport, and he could not get through to the Chinese Embassy no matter how hard he tried. The man was forced to post the video, hoping that the embassy would see the video and call back.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, Xinhua Daily has deleted the relevant articles refuting Beijing Youth Daily’s criticism of throwing eggs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 8, Liaoning. A retired soldier posted a video saying that after getting his veterans’ preferential card, he found that he still had to pay for buses and subways, and still had to queue up to see a doctor. “What is the use of this preferential card?”
